actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill authorizing the entry or parole into the United States of Cuban refugees.

summary.text: Provides that, a native or citizen of Cuba who fled that country subsequent to January 1, l959, and who (1) is physically present in any other country on the date of the enactment of this Act; (2) has not been firmly resettled; and (3) is otherwise admissible to the United States may be paroled into the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the entry or parole into the United States of Cuban refugees.
